title: How to Fix Call of Duty Ghosts Crashes

steps.title: Exit the CoD Ghosts and Steam completely.
steps.content: Exit the CoD Ghosts and Steam completely.

steps.title: Double click Computer desktop icon.
steps.content: Double click Computer desktop icon.

steps.title: Open any of the following folders whichever exists:
steps.content: Open any of the following folders whichever exists: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\Common\Call of Duty Ghosts\DirectX C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\Common\Call of Duty Ghosts\DirectX

steps.title: Right click the file named “DXSetup.exe” and select "Run as administrator".
steps.content: Right click the file named “DXSetup.exe” and select "Run as administrator".

steps.title: The Microsoft DirectX Setup wizard will guide you through the reinstallation process.
steps.content: The Microsoft DirectX Setup wizard will guide you through the reinstallation process.

steps.title: Open Microsoft DirectX Diagnostic Tool.
steps.content: Open Microsoft DirectX Diagnostic Tool. If you're using Windows 8.1/ 8, press Windows Key + X. Select Search. Type "DxDiag" in the Search Box. Click the Apps icon. Open that from the Search Results. If you're using Windows 7/ Vista, click Start. Type "DxDiag" and then press ENTER.

steps.title: A confirmation prompt will appear asking whether you want to check the drivers for digital signatures.
steps.content: A confirmation prompt will appear asking whether you want to check the drivers for digital signatures. Click No.

steps.title: DirectX Diagnostic Tool will open.
steps.content: DirectX Diagnostic Tool will open. Click the Display tab.

steps.title: Enable all the following checkboxes.
steps.content: Enable all the following checkboxes. The following checkboxes will not appear if you don't have a graphics card. AGP Texture Acceleration DirectDraw Acceleration Direct3D Acceleration

steps.title: Click the Exit button to save settings and quit.
steps.content: Click the Exit button to save settings and quit.

steps.title: Go to the Game Options | Video Options.
steps.content: Go to the Game Options | Video Options.

steps.title: Turn off the following features:
steps.content: Turn off the following features: Depth of Field Distortion Motion Blur Terrain Detail

steps.title: Activate the Windowed Mode by pressing Alt + Enter keys simultaneously.
steps.content: Activate the Windowed Mode by pressing Alt + Enter keys simultaneously.

steps.title: Double click the Steam desktop icon.
steps.content: Double click the Steam desktop icon.

steps.title: Sign-in to your account.
steps.content: Sign-in to your account.

steps.title: Go to the Settings page.
steps.content: Go to the Settings page.

steps.title: Click the Account tab.
steps.content: Click the Account tab.

steps.title: Uncheck the following checkbox:
steps.content: Uncheck the following checkbox: Don't save account credentials on this computer

steps.title: Click OK to save settings.
steps.content: Click OK to save settings.

steps.title: Click the Library tab.
steps.content: Click the Library tab.

steps.title: Do you find any progress indicator ahead of Call of Duty Ghosts game icon?
steps.content: Do you find any progress indicator ahead of Call of Duty Ghosts game icon? A progress indicator denotes the game is incompletely downloaded. In that case it will crash when attempted to run in the Offline Mode.

steps.title: Resume the download process if the progress indicator exists.
steps.content: Resume the download process if the progress indicator exists. If there is no such indicator, exit the Steam.

steps.title: After successful download follow the instructions for first time use.
steps.content: After successful download follow the instructions for first time use. For more information, refer the ReadMe file at the root of the COD Ghosts installation disc.

steps.title: Click the Steam menu, select Go Offline option
steps.content: Click the Steam menu, select Go Offline option

steps.title: Click the button named "Restart in offline mode".
steps.content: Click the button named "Restart in offline mode".

steps.title: Open the Steam.
steps.content: Open the Steam.

steps.title: Go to the Library page.
steps.content: Go to the Library page.

steps.title: Right click CoD:
steps.content: Right click CoD: Ghosts game icon, select Properties from the context menu.

steps.title: Click the General tab.
steps.content: Click the General tab.

steps.title: Uncheck "Enable Steam community" checkbox.
steps.content: Uncheck "Enable Steam community" checkbox.

steps.title: Save the settings and exit.
steps.content: Save the settings and exit.
